Protocols/BulletinItem.html#/s:13Bulleti.name: nextItem
Protocols/BulletinItem.html#/s:13Bulleti.abstract: The item to display after this one.

Protocols/BulletinItem.html#/s:13Bulleti.name: makeArrangedSubviews()
Protocols/BulletinItem.html#/s:13Bulleti.abstract: Creates the list of views to display on the bulletin.

Protocols/BulletinItem.html#/s:13Bulleti.name: tearDown()
Protocols/BulletinItem.html#/s:13Bulleti.abstract: Called by the manager when the item was removed from the bulletin view. Use this function

Protocols/BulletinItem.html#/s:13Bulleti.name: displayNextItem()
Protocols/BulletinItem.html#/s:13Bulleti.abstract: Displays the next item if it was set.

Protocols/BulletinItem.html.name: BulletinItem
Protocols/BulletinItem.html.abstract: An item that can be displayed inside a bulletin card.

Extensions/UIButton.html#/s:So8UIButtonC.name: setBackgroundColor(_:forState:)
Extensions/UIButton.html#/s:So8UIButtonC.abstract: Sets a solid background color for the button.

Classes/PageBulletinItem.html#/s:13Bulle.name: interfaceFactory
Classes/PageBulletinItem.html#/s:13Bulle.abstract: The interface factory used to generate the interface of the page.

Classes/PageBulletinItem.html#/s:13Bulle.name: init(title:)
Classes/PageBulletinItem.html#/s:13Bulle.abstract: Creates a bulletin page with the specified title.

Classes/PageBulletinItem.html#/s:13Bulle.name: image
Classes/PageBulletinItem.html#/s:13Bulle.abstract: An image to display below the title. Should be 128x128px.

Classes/PageBulletinItem.html#/s:13Bulle.name: descriptionText
Classes/PageBulletinItem.html#/s:13Bulle.abstract: A description text to display below the image.

Classes/PageBulletinItem.html#/s:13Bulle.name: isLongDescriptionText
Classes/PageBulletinItem.html#/s:13Bulle.abstract: Whether the description text is long. If true, the text will be displayed with a smaller font.

Classes/PageBulletinItem.html#/s:13Bulle.name: actionHandler
Classes/PageBulletinItem.html#/s:13Bulle.abstract: The code to execute when the action button is pressed.

Classes/PageBulletinItem.html#/s:13Bulle.name: alternativeHandler
Classes/PageBulletinItem.html#/s:13Bulle.abstract: The code to execute when the alternative button is pressed.

Classes/PageBulletinItem.html#/s:13Bulle.name: actionButtonTapped(sender:)
Classes/PageBulletinItem.html#/s:13Bulle.abstract: Handles a tap on the action button.

Classes/PageBulletinItem.html#/s:13Bulle.name: alternativeButtonTapped(sender:)
Classes/PageBulletinItem.html#/s:13Bulle.abstract: Handles a tap on the alternative button.

Classes/BulletinManager.html#/s:13Bullet.name: init(rootItem:)
Classes/BulletinManager.html#/s:13Bullet.abstract: Creates a bulletin manager with the list of items to display.

Classes/BulletinManager.html#/s:13Bullet.name: prepare()
Classes/BulletinManager.html#/s:13Bullet.abstract: Prepares the bulletin iterface and displays the root item.

Classes/BulletinManager.html#/s:13Bullet.name: push(item:)
Classes/BulletinManager.html#/s:13Bullet.abstract: Displays a new item after the current one.

Classes/BulletinManager.html#/s:13Bullet.name: popItem()
Classes/BulletinManager.html#/s:13Bullet.abstract: Removes the current item from the stack and displays the previous item.

Classes/BulletinManager.html#/s:13Bullet.name: popToRootItem()
Classes/BulletinManager.html#/s:13Bullet.abstract: Removes all the items from the stack and displays the root item.

Classes/BulletinManager.html#/s:13Bullet.name: presentBulletin(above:animated:completion:)
Classes/BulletinManager.html#/s:13Bullet.abstract: Presents the bulletin above the specified view controller.

Classes/BulletinManager.html#/s:13Bullet.name: dismissBulletin(animated:)
Classes/BulletinManager.html#/s:13Bullet.abstract: Dismisses the bulletin and clears the current page.

Classes/ContainerView.html#/s:13Bulletin.name: contentInset
Classes/ContainerView.html#/s:13Bulletin.abstract: The spacing between the edges of the container and those of the content view.

Classes/BulletinInterfaceFactory.html#/s.name: init()
Classes/BulletinInterfaceFactory.html#/s.abstract: Creates a new interface factory with the default configuration.

Classes/BulletinInterfaceFactory.html#/s.name: tintColor
Classes/BulletinInterfaceFactory.html#/s.abstract: The tint color to apply to button elements.

Classes/BulletinInterfaceFactory.html#/s.name: actionButtonTitleColor
Classes/BulletinInterfaceFactory.html#/s.abstract: The title color to apply to action button.

Classes/BulletinInterfaceFactory.html#/s.name: compactDescriptionFontSize
Classes/BulletinInterfaceFactory.html#/s.abstract: The font size of compact description labels.

Classes/BulletinInterfaceFactory.html#/s.name: makeGroupStack(spacing:)
Classes/BulletinInterfaceFactory.html#/s.abstract: Creates a stack view to contain a group of objects.

Classes/HighlightButton.html.name: HighlightButton
Classes/HighlightButton.html.abstract: A button that provides a visual feedback when the user interacts with it.

Classes/BulletinInterfaceFactory.html.abstract: Generates interface elements for bulletins. Use this class to create custom bulletin items witg

Classes/ContainerView.html.name: ContainerView
Classes/ContainerView.html.abstract: A view containing a subview, known as the content view.

Classes/BulletinManager.html.name: BulletinManager
Classes/BulletinManager.html.abstract: An object that manages the presentation of a bulletin.
